chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 has a problem: I need the CIF to be put on the invoice. Thank you,

Dear ecomobile:

I hope you are having a great day.

The customer requests that the invoice shows the VAT number, here I share it with you.
VAT NUMBER: G04212536

Can you please send us the invoice within 48 hours? If we do not receive it in time, we will be forced to apply the Back Market letter and grant a commercial gesture to the customer for the value of 20% of the order, which is 50 euros at your expense.

Please make sure that the invoice contains:
1. The IMEI number (if the device is a smart phone)
2. the customer's billing address (which may be different from the delivery address)
3. the mention [VAT not applicable “Special regime - second hand goods”] or any other equivalent (if you are in marginal VAT regime).
If you need more information about the invoice, here is an article that will answer your questions: https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/360019750759-Comment-%C3%A9tablir-une -B2C-invoice-complies-%C3%A0-the-r%C3%A8regulation-

We are counting on you! Thank you very much.

I will be waiting for your message.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
